TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StorageInfo extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides access and information for manipulating data stores in a .

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo CreateStream (string name);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo CreateStream(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name for the new stream.
Docs.summary: Creates a new stream with a given name.
Docs.returns: The new stream with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo.CreateStream%2A> method creates a new stream with <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo> default settings set to CompressionOption.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CompressionOption.NotCompressed> and EncryptionOption.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptionOption.None>.

MemberSignature.Value: public void DeleteSubStorage (string name);
.method public hidebysig instance void DeleteSubStorage(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the sub-store to delete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the specified sub-store itself contains child sub-stores, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo.DeleteSubStorage%2A> also recursively deletes all descendant sub-stores.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo GetStreamInfo (string name);

Docs.param: The name of the instance to return.
Docs.summary: Returns the instance with the given name.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo[] GetStreams ();
.method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo[] GetStreams() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns an array of the instances that are currently contained in this store.
Docs.returns: An array of the objects, each pointing to an I/O steam defined within this store.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo.GetStreams%2A> will always return a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo> array, but the array may be empty (zero-length) if there are no streams defined in the store.
<xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo.GetStreams%2A> provides a snapshot of the streams currently defined in the store. The individual <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo> objects will reflect the updated state of their respective streams, but the returned array will not be updated with any additions or deletions. Call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo.GetStreams%2A> again to obtain an updated array as streams added or deleted to the store.

Docs.param: The name of the sub-store to return.
Docs.summary: Returns the child sub-store with a given name.
Docs.returns: The child sub-store with the specified .

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo[] GetSubStorages ();
.method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo[] GetSubStorages() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns an array of the child sub-stores that are currently contained in this store.
Docs.returns: An array of objects, each pointing to a sub-store defined within this store.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo.GetSubStorages%2A> will always return a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo> array, but the array may be empty (zero-length) if there are no sub-stores.
<xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo.GetSubStorages%2A> provides a snapshot of the sub-stores currently defined in this store. The individual <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo> objects will reflect the updated state of their respective stores, but the returned array will not be updated with any additions or deletions. Call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo.GetSubStorages%2A> again to obtain an updated array as sub-stores added or deleted to the store.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Name { get; }
.property instance string Name

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The name of a sub-store is specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo.CreateSubStorage%2A> method and cannot be changed after created.
